backend/main.mo: Defines the Ribbit canister with storage, access control, user data, ponds, posts, ribbits, tags, likes, and activity-tracking structures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a layout update request to the affected frontend LilyPage file and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing layout, components, and behavior across the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining the root container and loading the frontend’s main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, theme provider, and all application routes including TagHubPage.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark toggle button component using useBookmarks to add or remove a lily from saved items.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Empty placeholder file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with navigation links and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with search UI, navigation controls, user avatar, and mobile/desktop behavior handling.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout wrapper with header, footer, and a mobile sidebar drawer that closes on route change.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Left sidebar navigation showing links and recent activity with active-route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Card component displaying a post with avatar, metadata, image handling, and like/share interactions.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Mobile drawer wrapper that toggles a sliding left sidebar and manages body scroll locking.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Sidebar showing pond details, stats, moderators, and join/leave controls with loading states.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Mobile pond header rendering banner, profile image, description, and tab navigation.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a post card component.
Empty placeholder file for an emoji tray component.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Displays a threaded ribbit reply with avatar, content, timestamp, like button, and reply form.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Right sidebar listing trending ponds, popular tags, and recent high‑view posts with loading states.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Mobile full‑screen search modal showing trending searches, suggestions, and a search input with callbacks.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Dropdown search panel displaying trending searches and suggestions based on the query.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Sidebar showing top, trending, and newest tags using tag stats modules.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled wrappers around TabsList and TabsTrigger with custom underline classes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs with localStorage persistence and helper functions to modify them.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, stored identities, and client creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a CSS media query matches and updates on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating pond, user, and search data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables for light and dark modes, and custom utility classes for UI behaviors.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Provides a helper to format large numbers into short notation like k, M, or B.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Validates, normalizes, and returns error messages for alphanumeric pond names.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Implements sharing a lily URL using Web Share API with clipboard and textarea fallbacks and toast feedback.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes alphanumeric tags and provides optional tag error messages.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages user identity, Froggy Phrase storage, and backup/restore logic using localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Tracks per-lily cooldown timestamps in localStorage to limit view count increments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with project description, features, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Displays a list of ponds with join status, loading states, and navigation to create or view ponds.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Form page for creating a lily post with support for text, image, or link types, tag suggestions, pond selection, and input validation.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Page for creating a new pond with name validation, description, froggy phrase rules, and optional banner/profile image uploads.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a create-post page.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage showing a feed of lilies with trending/new sorting, optional search results, and sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Displays a single lily with image handling, view count incrementing, likes, and ribbit (comment) creation.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Shows detailed pond info including moderators, visibility, images, and allows the user to leave the pond.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Fetches pond data, lists lilies sorted by timestamp, and handles join actions with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a post page.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Displays locally bookmarked lily posts, fetching each lily and allowing removal from bookmarks.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Shows top, trending, and newest tags with stats using tabbed navigation and server-fetched tag lists.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Displays lilies for a specific tag with sorting options and redirects to canonical tags when needed.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Provides user profile and settings management including username changes, avatars, ponds, and admin tools.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, radius, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata and feature request tracking for aligning LilyPage layout elements.
